title: Strengthening Equity in Mathematics Education Through Collaborative Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts and Practical Application Experience
context.additional_context: Utilizes simple digital tools via smartphones, requiring consideration of learners' diverse backgrounds

learning_goals: Learners enhance mathematical modeling skills through collaborative problem-solving activities.
Learners can explain complex mathematical concepts using peer feedback and relationship-centered instructional methods.
Learners strengthen awareness of educational equity through experiences in designing math problems connected to social contexts.
Learners complete distributed learning design projects utilizing smartphone-based collaborative tools.

resources: Pre-Learning PDF Materials for Mathematical Concepts
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
